Containers.Name: SCSI Enclosure Monitor
Containers.Description: Monitors SES-capable SCSI enclosures (such as disk shelves); tested to work with the popular NetApp IOMs (specifically IOM6 in DS4246).
Containers.Changes: ###2025.11.09 - release note: welcome to the first version of the package. - release note: please report any problems in the support topic.
